## Initial Tasks

Setelah project board dibuat, tambahkan tasks berikut:

### Backlog
- [ ] Deploy ke Base Sepolia testnet
- [ ] Deploy ke Base mainnet
- [ ] Add contract verification
- [ ] Create frontend interface
- [ ] Add more comprehensive tests

### In Progress
- [x] Setup Hardhat project
- [x] Create ERC20 contract
- [x] Write tests
- [x] Create deploy script

### Done
- [x] Initial project setup
- [x] ERC20 token implementation
- [x] Test suite
- [x] Documentation

## Notes

- Update project board setiap kali ada progress
- Link issues dan PRs ke project board
- Gunakan labels untuk kategorisasi
